Hello

Please visit our FAQ on how to get started and how to do your own re=
search
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/searchsitegoogle.htm

we also provided =
ways for you to do your own research in Japanese by
using this page
http://=
www.shinsengumihq.com/ShinsengumiNames.htm

we have listed recommended free=
 online translators and the best
Japanese sites here
http://www.shinsengumi=
hq.com/links.htm

tips on library research
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/shi=
nsenresearch.htm

it is possible to simply post machine translations on our=
 site however
we don't want to post errors or misinterpretations so we have=
 relied
on human volunteers and English language texts this is why we have =
not
post biographies on all captains

all "facts" are here
http://www.shins=
engumihq.com/facts.htm

please come here http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/=

hit "messages"
there will be a "search" option and type in keywords like "=
Okita" to
read old messages on this list

we often discuss rumors/theories =
or any other interesting tidbits on
this list---we try not to post rumors a=
nd theories on the main website
because it would really confuse visitors

W=
e are part of fandom but assume a professional tone with the sincere
hope t=
hat the Shinsengumi will be taken "seriously" as a historical
topic but man=
y of us do other fun things too!---that's why you'll see
alot of "nerd work=
" on the site (^_^) many of us don't know Japanese
so we had to expand our =
approach considerably

I am also available for http://www.shinsengumihq.com=
 "walk throughs"
via AOL Instant Messengers my id is "badgerturtle"
